thread.title: Get a free burger in Dubai this Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: Get a free burger in Dubai this Valentine's Day

title: Get a free burger in Dubai this Valentine's Day
text:
Get a free burger in Dubai this Valentine's Day Curated by Keith Pere√±a /Dubai   | Last updated on February 13, 2017 at 02.33 pm Share 
(@naziajawwad/Instagram) Love is in the air, love for burgers that is Tomorrow, as well all know it - is Valentine's Day. Couples around Dubai will be going out after work, having dinner at some mall or restaurant. But what if we tell you that you and your loved one can celebrate the day without spending ANYTHING AT ALL. That certainly is the case with local Dubai restaurant Habibi Burger which is offering 500 delicious burgers COMPLETELY FREE OF CHARGE. Speaking to Khaleej Times, staff from the restaurant said that there are no strings attached to avail of the offers. All a couple (or person, for the single people in the house) has to do is to follow Habibi Burger on their social media channels, namely Instagram and Facebook . After that you're all set! They also encourage diners to share their experiences using the hashtag #HabibiLoves and #HabibiHappy. The promotion starts tomorrow, February 14, 11AM-7PM in Habibi Burger, located at Lotus Apartments and Spa, Dubai Marina. Share
